Articles.Content: 1357: A bucket of mercury and a straw. Also, a signpost reads "What's the next digit in this particular floor's sequence?"
1358: The internets' sewers.
1359: The internet's airport
1360: The Internet.
1361:  A kiosk describing the Battle of Visby, which coincidentally occurred the same year.
1362: All is black, and it is eerily silent. You hear a clank of robotic parts, and get the [Oh my!] out of there.
1363:  Home an Albino Deathclaw, her eggs are about to hatch and you've disturbed the nest...let's see if you can run fast enough!
After screaming like a little girl, you make it up the stairs and find Vault LOL
1365: (MCCCLXV) was a common year starting on Wednesday

1366: You meet BOB.

 

 

         Say hi to BOB.
1367: The spam headquarters, all the spam is produced here.

1368: The spam headquarters, all the spam is produced here.

Edited January 23, 2016 by Matuchkin
1369: The spam headquarters, all the spam is produced here.
1370: Open-air SSTO takeoff point.
1372:You see a kingdom on clouds and hear the voice of david bowie.

1373: You pass by the hope for freedom, past a chance to discover the cure for cancer, you wave hullo to a chance for a life, say hi to the cure for HIV, walk past global peace, and continue on to the next floor, remembering your urgent appointment.

1374: You get to your urgent appointment...with the snack bar.  Rows of snacks galore.  you reach for a bag of chips when you hear a snap.  You've been caught in a Kerbal trap...   Somehow you get out and run up to the next floor, forgetting about what lies below...

1375:

You find the elevator and open it. In it is the next floor.

1375-6: In the floor-elevator lies another elevator. Inside the elevator is a staircase leading to a moving elevator-floor that is actually an escalator going sideways through dimensions. You end up in the 5th dimension, and go on all the building's floors at the same time before ending up back in the 3rd dimension, a few moments after you exited the 1365th floor.

Dazed, you ascend to the 1376th floor, contemplating your newly-started migrane.

Edited January 25, 2016 by Matuchkin
1376: no medication, no relief found. You continue on hoping to find some aspirin for the migrane...

1377: You find a 4-dimensional aspirin bottle. You do not know how to get the aspirin out, but try to pick up the bottle. Instantly, you teleport into the 6th dimension. Now, not only do you exist in the past, present and future at the same time, you also exist in all outcomes and paths that could have been or will be taken in the past present, and future. You walk around on this floor, while walking around on the previous floors, while walking around in a world where the building wasn't even built yet, etc, ad infinitum. You are napoleon, you,  stalin, an alien, etc (ad infinitum) at the same time. Suddenly, you feel an infinite amount of jolts, and appear in the 7th dimension. You are you multiplied by you. Not understanding what's happening, you suddenly feel another infinity-squared amount of jolts, and enter the 7th spherical spacial dimention. You whisk back into the 3rd cartesian dimension, and, with an even worse migraine and no aspirin, you find BOB.

Say hi to BOB.

Edited January 25, 2016 by Matuchkin

*wrong comment, do not read this*

Edited January 26, 2016 by Matuchkin

"Hi, BOB."

1378: This floor is dark and scary. You hear scratching and whispering noises coming from the walls, and you walk really fast to the next floor.

You enter the next floor, hoping for another damn aspirin (3 dimensional this time, thankyouverymuch). You meet BOB again, but whisk him out of the way. You hear a creaking sound below you, suspecting it's a structural fault in the building...
